name: Visvash Attri

posts.title: What is product management for a 12-year old?

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: Worked on the project for client PropVivo, a homeowner association management firm based in Bellevue WA. Conceptualized a digital assistant for Propvivo's users, a minimum viable product currently in use by 10000+ users. Strategized the MVP, user experience including user stories & SWOT analysis, product features, product launch, the marketing campaign, product success metrics and rollout strategy
experience.description_html: Worked on the project for client PropVivo, a homeowner association management firm based in Bellevue WA. Conceptualized a digital assistant for Propvivo's users, a minimum viable product currently in use by 10000+ users. Strategized the MVP, user experience including user stories & SWOT analysis, product features, product launch, the marketing campaign, product success metrics and rollout strategy <!---->

projects: [{"title":"Restaurant of The Future","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"Redesigned an autonomous robotic waiter to serve at restaurants, significantly cheaper than existing models. Coordinated with cross-functional teams, and worked on diverse roles due to changing dynamics for the project. Applied leadscrew-based mechanism to Al-extrusions, to carry and transfer payloads (food trays) up to 10kg to variable platforms with the help of a 3-wheel Omni-chassis."},{"title":"Terrace Farming Robot, Inter IIT Technical Meet 8.0","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"Prototyped a fully automatic machine to increase the yield of farmers practising terrace agriculture in India. The robot can navigate on terraces and perform ploughing, seeding, watering and harvesting of the crops. Analyzed the problems faced by a field visit and incorporated the stakeholders' requirements and cost constraints. Led all the sprint planning, brainstorming sessions, resulting in predictable and rapid feature deliveries."},{"title":"Chitrak-Quadruped Robot","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Aug 2019","description":"Delivered with a 4 member team, an economical & energy-efficient quadruped robot using self-locking actuators.Analysed various gait methods, determined the design parameters for the robot, and optimized iteratively.Proposed foot placement methods and braced the robot using aluminium, curbing the robot's weight under 9kg."},{"title":"Martian Harmony, Srishti 2019","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"Manufactured a robot that could play Flute and Piano like humans, presented it at the Srishti 2019 exhibition.Related mechatronics' concepts with real-life scenarios, and designed the complete setup using Solidworks."}]
